Input: We look forward to seeing you in September. Help us begin the new school year with an
excellent start by having the following school supplies.
Please send in these items on the first day of school with your child's name and class on
1 Ream of computer paper Ex. Staples brand
1 Box of Crayola crayons (24 or larger) OR 1 Box of Crayola colored pencils (12 count or larger)
Product: Crayola crayons larger Crayola colored pencils

Input: 1 Box of gallon size baggies (Ziploc) - BOYS
1 Box of quart size baggies (Ziploc) - GIRLS
*The teachers may request additional items. We will give you the list of
additional items at the parent orientation in September, if there are any.
